title: Reasons shewing that there is no need of such a reformation of the publique 1. Doctrine. 2. Worship. 3. Rites & ceremonies. 4. Church-government. 5. Discipline. As it is pretended by reasons offered to the serious consideration of this present Parliament, by divers ministers of sundry counties in England. By H.S. D.D. Chaplain to his Majestie in ordinary.
author: H. S. (Henry Savage), 1604?-1672.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for Humphrey Robinson at the three Pigeons in St. Pauls Church-yard,
